languages.text: "Ты называешь зверя, лишенного воли, образцом для подражания? Я вижу лишь сломленный дух, закованный в цепи жестокости".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Вы лишили зверя духа и воли и называете этот живой труп образцом для подражания? Я... уже не в силах удивляться".

languages.text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
languages.original_text: "Ты называешь зверя, лишенного воли, образцом для подражания? Я вижу лишь сломленный дух, закованный в цепи жестокости".

traits.locale_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
"You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
"You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
"You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
"You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."
"You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

languages.text: "Ihr betrachtet ein Wesen ohne freien Willen als Vorbild, dem zu folgen ist? Ich sehe nur einen gebrochenen Geist, gefesselt an die Ketten der Grausamkeit."
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr betrachtet ein Wesen ohne freien Willen als Vorbild, dem zu folgen ist? Ich sehe nur einen gebrochenen Geist, gefesselt an die Ketten der Grausamkeit."

languages.text: « Vous considérez donc une bête sans libre arbitre comme un modèle à suivre ? Tout ce que je vois, c'est un esprit enchaîné par la cruauté. »
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: « Vous considérez donc une bête sans libre arbitre comme un modèle à suivre ? Tout ce que je vois, c'est un esprit enchaîné par la cruauté. »

languages.text: “你居然会把一头没有自由意志的野兽当做榜样？我只看到了一个破碎的灵魂，被残酷的锁链束缚着。”
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: “你居然会把一头没有自由意志的野兽当做榜样？我只看到了一个破碎的灵魂，被残酷的锁链束缚着。”

languages.text: «¿Consideras una bestia carente de libre albedrío un ejemplo a seguir? Yo no veo más que un espíritu roto atrapado por las cadenas de la crueldad».
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: «¿Consideras una bestia carente de libre albedrío un ejemplo a seguir? Yo no veo más que un espíritu roto atrapado por las cadenas de la crueldad».

languages.text: 「自由意志を持たぬ獣を模範と見なすのか？私には、ただ残酷さの鎖に縛られた壊れた魂にしか見えない」
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: 「自由意志を持たぬ獣を模範と見なすのか？私には、ただ残酷さの鎖に縛られた壊れた魂にしか見えない」

languages.text: "İradesi olmayan bir yaratığı örnek alınacak bir şey olarak mı görüyorsunuz? Benim gördüğüm tek şey; zulüm zincirleriyle bağlanmış, çökmüş bir ruh."
languages.original_text: "You see a beast devoid of free will as an example to follow? All I see is a broken spirit bound in the chains of cruelty."

traits.locale_text: "İradesi olmayan bir canavarı örnek alınacak bir şey olarak mı görüyorsunuz? Benim gördüğüm tek şey, zulüm zincirleriyle bağlanmış, çökmüş bir ruh."
